alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Orange; Perry; Scott; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dubois, northern Crawford, northwestern Perry, Scott, Orange and Washington Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 414 PM EDT/314 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Paoli, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Salem around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Scottsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Dubois; Orange; Perry; Scott; Washington
